title: How the East Palestine train derailment fueled fear on TikTok
description: The train derailment in East Palestine, Ohio, has turned TikTok into a hotbed of misinformation and conspiracy theories, prompting people beyond the region to worry about potential repercussions of the chemical release.

title: Ozy Media CEO Carlos Watson arrested on fraud charges
description: Carlos Watson, the chief executive officer of the embattled digital media company Ozy, was arrested on fraud charges Thursday, according to court documents obtained by NBC News.

title: TikTok banned from E.U. Commission phones over cybersecurity
description: The European Union’s executive branch said Thursday that it has temporarily banned TikTok from phones used by employees as a cybersecurity measure.
